title: FS T206 Ty Cobb with Carolina Brights Back -SOLD
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: FS T206 Ty Cobb with Carolina Brights Back -SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone.

I am selling my T206 Cobb w/ Carolina Brights back. Graded SGC 20.  Price is $2400. I will take care of the shipping and insurance costs. 

Only 8 graded on the SGC POP report and 4 on the PSA POP report. 

Please email me if interested at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

[URL=http://s251.photobucket.com/user/blunder19/media/Cobb%20CB%20front_zpsloxv0kfi.jpg.html][IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/Cobb%20CB%20front_zpsloxv0kfi.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s251.photobucket.com/user/blunder19/media/Cobb%20CB%20Back_zpsbzwdmqyj.jpg.html][IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/Cobb%20CB%20Back_zpsbzwdmqyj.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

I guess the good cards sell fast.. the card is now Sold

thanks
Damn! Nice card - congrats to the new owner.
I owned it at one time .ANd I wished that I still had the card. Having over 70 Red Cobbs overall and 44 at one time, I love that card any back !

I especially like the "Carolina Brits" back much like it's counterpart the "Carolina Nats" back! :) :D

Cool card indeed!

Peace, Mike
